channel.title: Career on Wendy's Hacker Mom Space
channel.description: Recent content in Career on Wendy's Hacker Mom Space

item.title: How My Work Experience Helped Me Stay Sane Caring for a Newborn
item.description: To be honest, I didn’t know what to expect going into maternity leave. I had never been the “mom-type”, and just the idea of stay at home all the time with a newborn kind of scared me. I thought it would be very isolated, very exhausting, and very desperate. I asked a lot of friends for help, and usually they told me: “Oh, you won’t have time to worry about this.
